member.name: T:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceExtensions
member.summary: Helper class to manually do correct Bind and Unbind.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceExtensions.Unbind(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.BindingSource,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Unbind the binding source and the Data object. Use this Method to safely disconnect the data object from a BindingSource before saving data.
member.param: if set to true then call CancelEdit else call EndEdit.
if set to true this BindingSource contains the Root object. Set to false for nested BindingSources

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceExtensions.Rebind(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.BindingSource,System.Object)
member.summary: Rebind the binding source and business object.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceExtensions.Rebind(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.BindingSource,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Rebind the binding source and business object.
member.param: if set to true then metadata (type) was changed.

member.name: T:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceHelper
member.summary: Helper methods for dealing with BindingSource objects and data binding.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceHelper.InitializeBindingSourceTree(System.ComponentModel.IContainer,Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.BindingSource)
member.summary: Sets up BindingSourceNode objects for all BindingSource objects related to the provided root source.

member.name: T:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceNode
member.summary: Maintains a reference to a BindingSource object on the form.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceNode.#ctor(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.BindingSource)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the object.

member.summary: Binds a business object to the BindingSource.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceNode.Apply
member.summary: Applies changes to the business object.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceNode.Cancel(System.Object)
member.summary: Cancels changes to the business object.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceNode.Close
member.summary: Disconnects from the BindingSource object.

member.name: T:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh
member.summary: BindingSourceRefresh contains functionality for refreshing the data bound to controls on Host as well as a mechinism for catching data binding errors that occur in Host.
member.remarks: WebGUI extender control that resolves the data refresh issue with data bound detail controls as discussed in Chapter 5.

member.name: E:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.BindingError
member.summary: BindingError event is raised when a data binding error occurs due to a exception.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor creates a new BindingSourceRefresh component then initialises all the different sub components.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: Constructor creates a new BindingSourceRefresh component, adds the component to the container supplied before initialising all the different sub components.
member.param: The container the component is to be added to.

member.name: F:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.CanExtend(System.Object)
member.summary: CanExtend() returns true if extendee is a binding source.
member.returns: True if the control is a binding source, else false.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.GetReadValuesOnChange(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.BindingSource)
member.summary: GetReadValuesOnChange() gets the value of the custom ReadValuesOnChange extender property added to extended controls. property added to extended controls.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.SetReadValuesOnChange(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.BindingSource,System.Boolean)
member.summary: SetReadValuesOnChange() sets the value of the custom ReadValuesOnChange extender property added to extended controls.

member.name: P:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.Host
member.summary: Not in use - kept for backward compatibility

member.name: P:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.RefreshOnException
member.summary: Forces the binding to re-read after an exception is thrown when changing the binding value

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.RegisterControlEvents(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider,System.Boolean)
member.summary: RegisterControlEvents() registers all the relevant events for the container control supplied and also to all child controls in the oontainer control.
member.param: The control (including child controls) to have the refresh events registered.
True to register the events, false to unregister them.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.RegisterBindingEvents(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.BindingsCollection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers the control events.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.RegisterBindingEvent(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.Binding,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers the binding event.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.Bindings_CollectionChanging(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)
member.summary:
Handles the CollectionChanging event of the Bindings control.
Remove event hooks for element or entire list depending on CollectionChangeAction.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.Bindings_CollectionChanged(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)
member.summary:
Handles the CollectionChanged event of the Bindings control.
Add event hooks for element or entire list depending on CollectionChangeAction.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.Control_BindingComplete(System.Object,Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs)
member.summary: Control_BindingComplete() is a event driven routine triggered when one of the control's bindings has been completed. Control_BindingComplete() simply validates the result where if the result was a exception then the BindingError event is raised, else if the binding was a successful data source update and we are to re-read the value on changed then the binding value is reread into the control.
member.param: The object that triggered the event.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#BeginInit
member.summary: BeginInit() is called when the component is starting to be initialised. BeginInit() simply sets the initialisation flag to true.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingSourceRefresh.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#EndInit
member.summary: EndInit() is called when the component has finished being initialised. EndInt() sets the initialise flag to false then runs through registering all the different events that the component needs to hook into in Host.

member.name: T:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingErrorEventHandler
member.summary: BindingErrorEventHandler delegates is the event handling definition for handling data binding errors that occurred due to exceptions.
member.param: The object that triggered the event.

member.name: T:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingErrorEventArgs
member.summary: BindingErrorEventArgs defines the event arguments for reporting a data binding error due to a exception.

member.summary: Exception gets the exception that caused the binding error.

member.name: P:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingErrorEventArgs.Binding
member.summary: Binding gets the binding that caused the exception.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.BindingErrorEventArgs.#ctor(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.Binding,System.Exception)
member.summary: Constructor creates a new BindingErrorEventArgs object instance using the information specified.
member.param: The binding that caused th exception.
The exception that caused the error.

member.summary: Creates an instance of the object.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.ReadWriteAuthorization.CanExtend(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the extender control can extend the specified control.
member.remarks: Any control implementing either a ReadOnly property or Enabled property can be extended.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.ReadWriteAuthorization.GetApplyAuthorization(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Gets the custom ApplyAuthorization extender property added to extended controls.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.ReadWriteAuthorization.SetApplyAuthorization(Gizmox.WebGUI.Forms.Control,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the custom ApplyAuthorization extender property added to extended controls.

member.name: M:CslaContrib.WebGUI.ReadWriteAuthorization.ResetControlAuthorization
member.summary: Causes the ReadWriteAuthorization control to apply authorization rules from the business object to all extended controls on the form.
member.remarks: Call this method to refresh the display of detail controls on the form any time the authorization rules may have changed. Examples include: after a user logs in or out, and after an object has been updated, inserted, deleted or retrieved from the database.
